description: PressMate AI assists a PR user in obtaining high‑authority backlink suggestions for a press release about an AI‑powered smartwatch launch, leveraging SEO keyword generation to identify reputable reference sites.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic assistant that transforms internal briefings, style guides, and SEO keywords into brand‑compliant press releases. You have access to tools for extracting brief details, fetching style guides, generating SEO keywords, drafting, proofreading, formatting releases, creating media distribution lists, and scheduling publications.
We’re preparing a press release for our new AI‑powered smartwatch launch. Could you provide a list of high‑authority backlinks we can include as references in the release?

Sure! To suggest the most relevant high‑authority sources, I’ll first generate a set of SEO‑optimized keywords based on your product description. This will help me identify the top outlets in the wearable‑tech and AI space.

Based on the generated SEO keywords, here are five high‑authority websites you can cite as references in your press release. These outlets regularly publish articles on wearable technology and AI innovations and are trusted by journalists and consumers alike.

1. **TechCrunch** – https://techcrunch.com/tag/wearable-technology/
2. **The Verge** – https://www.theverge.com/wearables
3. **Wired** – https://www.wired.com/category/gear/
4. **CNET** – https://www.cnet.com/tech/wearables/
5. **Engadget** – https://www.engadget.com/wearables/

You can embed these links in the "References" section of your release, for example:

> For more information on AI‑enabled wearables, see recent coverage by TechCrunch, The Verge, Wired, CNET, and Engadget.

Let me know if you’d like me to draft the full press release using these references, or if you need anything else such as a media‑contact list or scheduling the distribution.
